settings.heading: The Perfect Brow Duo
settings.subheading: Everything you need for flawless brows, every day
settings.description: Clean your brows, then style them to perfection with our gentle 2-step system.

settings.custom_description: The complete brow care system. Start with our gentle shampoo to remove oils and buildup, then apply our clear gel for long-lasting hold that looks naturally yours.

settings.heading: Safe for Your Most Delicate Skin
settings.text: Formulated specifically for the sensitive eye area. Our pH-balanced formula removes impurities without irritation, making it perfect for daily use on natural brows and extensions alike.

settings.heading: Strong Hold, Natural Feel
settings.text: Our clear gel provides lasting hold without the stiffness or flaking of traditional brow products. Keeps your brows in place from morning to night while maintaining a natural, touchable finish.

settings.heading: Effortless Daily Beauty
settings.text: Streamline your morning routine with our simple system. Just cleanse, condition, and style. Takes less than 2 minutes but delivers professional-looking results that last all day.

settings.heading: Why Buy Together?
settings.text: The secret to perfect brows isn't just the right gel‚Äîit's the right preparation. Our shampoo removes oils and buildup that prevent gel from adhering properly. Clean brows mean better grip, which means more consistent, longer-lasting results. When you use them together, you're not just styling your brows‚Äîyou're creating the perfect foundation for flawless hold.

settings.heading: Step 1: Cleanse
settings.text: Wet brows and apply a small amount of Brow & Lash Shampoo. Gently massage with fingertips or our brush to remove oils, makeup, and buildup. This creates the perfect base for styling.

settings.heading: Step 2: Rinse & Dry
settings.text: Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Pat dry with a clean towel. Your brows should feel clean and slightly textured‚Äîperfect for gel application.

settings.heading: Step 3: Style
settings.text: Apply Eyebrow Gel with the built-in wand. Brush upward and outward, following your natural brow shape. The gel sets quickly for immediate hold that lasts all day.

settings.heading: Hyaluronic Acid
settings.text: Hydrates and plumps brow hairs while maintaining flexibility. Helps prevent dryness and brittleness.

settings.heading: Biotin
settings.text: Strengthens hair structure and supports healthy brow growth. Essential for maintaining brow health over time.

settings.heading: Peptides
settings.text: Condition and protect delicate brow hairs from environmental damage and styling stress.

settings.heading: Vitamin E
settings.text: Antioxidant protection that nourishes the skin around your brows while providing anti-aging benefits.

settings.heading: Meet Sarah, Founder of IS Beauty Lux
settings.text: As a busy professional who struggled with sparse, unruly brows, Sarah couldn't find products that delivered both cleanliness and lasting hold without irritation. After years of mixing and matching products from different brands, she created The Duo‚Äîa simple, effective system that finally gave her the confidence of perfectly groomed brows every single day.
Finally, a brow gel that doesn't flake off by noon! The shampoo makes such a difference‚ÄîI never realized how much buildup was preventing my gel from working properly.

settings.heading: Can I use this with lash extensions?
settings.text: Yes! Our gentle formula is specifically designed to be safe for lash extensions and won't break down the adhesive.

settings.heading: Is this suitable for sensitive skin?
settings.text: Absolutely. Our pH-balanced formula is dermatologist-tested and designed for the delicate eye area.

settings.heading: How often should I use the shampoo?
settings.text: Daily use is safe and recommended for best results. Some people prefer every other day depending on their skin type.

settings.heading: Can I wear makeup over the gel?
settings.text: Yes, our clear gel works perfectly under brow makeup and actually helps it stay in place longer.

settings.heading: Will the gel flake or feel stiff?
settings.text: No. Our formula dries to a flexible, natural finish that moves with your skin without flaking or stiffness.

settings.heading: How long before I see results?
settings.text: You'll notice improved hold and appearance immediately. Consistent use over 2-4 weeks shows the best long-term brow health benefits.
